snippet: A standoff between troops along a disputed border has entered a third week, causing alarm in New Delhi.
abstract: Standoff between troops in mountains of Ladakh, disputed border between India and China,  has entered third week, causing alarm in New Delhi and tensions between countries.

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and EDWARD WONG
byline.contributor: Gardiner Harris reported from New Delhi, and Edward Wong from Beijing and Hangzhou, China. Hari Kumar contributed reporting from New Delhi. Sue-Lin Wong contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: A standoff between troops along a disputed border has entered a third week, causing alarm in New Delhi.

headline.seo: Border Dispute Between China and India Persists
headline.main: Where China Meets India in a High-Altitude Desert, Push Comes to Shove
headline.print_headline: Where China Meets India in a High-Altitude Desert, Push Comes to Shove

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
